text: Me'a She'arim, Hebrew: מאה שערים - "hundred gates", is a neighbourhood of Jerusalem. The Me'a She'arim neighbourhood was founded in 1874 and its population consists primarily of Haredi Jews. It is one of the oldest neighbourhoods of the city and lies northwest of the Old City of Jerusalem. Category:1874 establishments in Asia Category:Neighbourhoods of Jerusalem
title: Mea Shearim
